successes.title: GoSun Stove: Portable, High Efficiency Solar Cooker
successes.description: Only 20 minutes to a meal, safely sizzling up to 550°F, the GoSun Stove is the first truly practical fuel-free cooking solution.

Pledges.description: A RECIPE - Instead of buying another tired sandwich, hook us up with $5 bucks so we can buy some ingredients and whip up a new recipe with the GoSun Stove.  Thanks for seeing the light!
E-POSTER - learn more about the GoSun technology and explore solar energy principles with a digital poster
POSTER - learn more about the GoSun technology and explore solar energy principles with a 18" x 24" poster ready to light up your shop
T-SHIRT and POSTER - if you like what you see, here's something you can wear, along with a poster to share (electronic versions included)

TALK TO EXPERT - Do you have dreams to go solar?  Have an idea for a renewable energy business or invention?  Get a full hour consultation with GoSun founder, Patrick Sherwin, to discuss your project.  Since 2000, Patrick’s work with green building and solar energy has given him a broad base of experience on what’s needed to fuel our lives.

GoSun MINI - A miniature, yet mighty powerful version so you can run tasty experiments, check out the technology in action and solarize a snack. Includes: user's guide, cooking tray, cleaning brush, and field box

GoSun STOVE - GO-GETTER SPECIAL (MSRP $279, save $100) - Be one of the first to own a GoSun Stove.  Everything you need for a totally tubular cooking experience of and for a lifetime.  Basic package includes: Evacuated Tube Oven, Parabolic Reflectors/Tube Shields, Cooking Tray with handle, Carrying Handle that becomes a set of Support Legs, Cleaning Tool and User's Guide.

GoSun STOVE 
(MSRP $279, save $60) - Everything you need for a totally tubular cooking experience of and for a lifetime.  Basic package includes: Evacuated Tube Oven, Parabolic Reflectors/Tube Shields, Cooking Tray with handle, Carrying Handle that becomes a set of Support Legs, Cleaning Tool and User's Guide.

GoSun PRO-PACK - GO-GETTER SPECIAL (MSRP $369, save $110) - GoSun Stove unit described above, plus Padded Carrying Case, an extra Cooking Tray, Liquid Pour Spout, Custom Spatula and special access to new recipes, accessories and applications.

GoSun PRO-PACK (MSRP $369, save $70) - GoSun Stove unit described above, plus Padded Carrying Case, an extra Cooking Tray, Liquid Pour Spout, Custom Spatula and special access to new recipes, accessories and applications.
GO BIG - Combo Pack including GoSun PRO-PACK, GoSun MINI, T-SHIRT, POSTER and TALK TO EXPERT - (MSRP over $500, save over $120)

GO PARTY - You pick the outdoor event (large or small) and the GoSun founder, Patrick Sherwin, will come to you and bring an entourage of GoSun Stoves.  Large amounts and combinations of foods will be cooked up and your friends will all get a chance to whip up their own recipes.  Your guests will get $100 off a GoSun Stove purchase.  Costs related to travel and attendance may include additional fees.

GO EMPOWER -  Join the GoSun team on the first trip of our Empowerment Program to a village in the rural mountains of Haiti.  Learn what it is like to cook with solid fuels.  Conduct user-centered design research to provide insights for the development of our program.  Help coordinate educational efforts; modifying island recipes, surveying the market and deploying GoSuns with community leaders.  (includes GO BIG above, round-trip airfare in Continental US, add a friend for $2,200, trip dates TBD)
